column2:
"The thousands of lives we fought for
The painful and unyielding fight"

"Nightmares we face
Will we ever lay awake to see the sunlight?"

"Bloodthirsty beasts on the frontal
Waiting for us to break as they mumble:"
"Get lost
column3:
it's time
You cannot win every battle""""

column2:
"Stand by me, write your history
For the life that you forged is fractured and damaged"

"Fan the fire; kindle the flame
Born in you is a warrior"

"Be their barrier
Hold your spirits high! Keep up the fight!"

"Your strength blesses us all
So shine like a beacon. Heed our call, my passionate friend"

"I see the fire in your eyes burning bright
Rise up again and again"

"We don’t see to believe the bonds in the ones who carry us on
We'll never forget"

"The tears and love we share
Hopeful prayers will shine like stars in the night eternally"

"The words that could not be spoken
Are broken 'til they return to the earth"

"Wait for the world we dreamed of
'Til it is time to reach and claim it"

"The endless longing we cling to
Will one day burn away into ashes"

"We'll soldier on
The battle has not yet ended"

"Bathe this world in your radiance
Make the light that you weave shine through without fading"
"Towards the future we will engrave the proof that we're not alone"

"Face your destiny!
Don't shy away from your ambition!"

"The bruises on your soul will be released once you let go control
Your freedom is nigh"

"Raise up your voice as we cry to the sky
Until we must say goodbye"

"Behold, our time is now
We dance and rejoice with whole jubilee
Shine your light on mine"

"Untarnished journey to the stars we embark
The sun will shine on us all forevermore"

"The bruises on your soul will be released once you let go control
Your freedom is nigh"

"Raise up your voice as we cry to the sky
Until we must say goodbye"

"Behold, our time is now
We dance and rejoice with whole jubilee
Shine your light on mine"

"Untarnished journey to the stars we embark
The sun will shine on us all forevermore"
"With grace and pride"
"戦いの歌 ～Against fate～"
"Nadereh"
